alert.note: Alert for Boone County Except Southwest; Boone County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 12:55AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Newton and Boone Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 1254 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Carrollton to Osage to near Aurora. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Harrison... Jasper... Bergman... Western Grove... Valley Springs... Dugger... Olvey... Myrtle... Erbie... Upper Buffalo Wilderness Area... Red Bank... Winington... Lost Valley State Park... Capps... Willis... Pruitt... Crawford... Bellefonte... Alpena... Everton... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Boone County Except Southwest; Boone County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations
